Hello! I am a problem solver with Professional experience and demonstrated ability working on a wide range of projects such as environmental, Spatial analysis and Technology.
I bring creativity into everything I do especially maps. Skilled in ESRI ArcGIS Suite, Quantum GIS, Analytics and Spatial Technology, HEC-RAS Modelling.

About Me

I am a recent Master student with Environmental Science major at the University of Bremen. I finished my undergraduate study in Applied Geophysics major at the Federal University of Technology, Akure.
Here is my personal website which shows my own work, what I am currently working on and learning.
I would like to share the skills I have acquired so far in my learning curve.
The Portfolio above gives a sneak peek to the GIS related work I have been working on.
I have uploaded my published papers here in Publications.
